site_name: Flat Third Floor 126 Sinclair Road London W14 0NL
description: This council has been asked for its observations on application submitted to London Borough of Hammersmith & Fulham Council (2021/03956/FUL)  Demolition and re-building of the main roof above the third floor Flat to include the creation of a sunken roof terrace, installation of an air source heat pump, re-location of 1 rooflight, 9 solar panels, plant screening and green roofs at roof level; erection of a vertical dormer roof extension to replace the existing mansard roof in the rear roofslope; replacement of the existing doors with new window set and replacement of existing window with a new window at third floor level to the front elevation
